backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling user profiles, inquiries, and products with access control and admin-restricted operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing frontend files, components, and tests related to loading backend data and newsletter submissions.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-style mapping that summarizes the roles of major frontend components, hooks, pages, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes and applying global styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App entry with hash-based routing rendering the landing page, product detail page, or not-found page.
frontend/src/components/landing/Benefits: Static benefits section displaying three product advantages with icons and decorative imagery.
frontend/src/components/landing/ContactS: Contact form that submits inquiries to the backend with loading, success, and error states.
frontend/src/components/landing/Featured: Featured products grid fetching products from backend, showing skeletons, empty state, and navigation to product pages.
frontend/src/components/landing/HeroSect: Displays a hero banner with background image, headline, and button that scrolls to the products section.
frontend/src/components/landing/SiteFoot: Renders the site footer with brand info, quick links, social icons, and smooth-scroll navigation.
frontend/src/components/landing/Subscrib: Provides a newsletter subscription form with validation, mutation handling, and success/error states.
frontend/src/components/landing/Testimon: Fetches and displays customer testimonials with loading skeletons and fallback initials-based avatars.
frontend/src/data/products.ts: Defines product types and utilities for slug generation, product lookup, and backend-to-frontend mapping.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context providing login, logout, and identity persistence using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for products, testimonials, inquiries, and newsletter subscriptions using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and CSS variables for theme colors, typography, and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Shows a styled 404 page with message and button to navigate back home.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Displays a product detail view by fetching all products, mapping them, and showing image and descriptions with loading skeletons and a back button.
frontend/src/router/useHashRoute.ts: Implements simple hash-based routing with parsing for home, product, and not-found routes, plus navigation helpers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading URL query parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and removing them from hashes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, fonts, animations, and plugin usage for the frontend.
project_state.json: Contains project metadata, feature list, and requirements tracking for the beauty products website.
